## About This Site

This website is built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), an open-source scientific and technical publishing system. It's designed to showcase reproducible research with interactive data visualizations.

## Features

- **Interactive Visualizations**: Built with ggplot2 and plotly
- **Reproducible Research**: All code and data available for download
- **Academic Standards**: Proper citations and references
- **Version Control**: Hosted on GitHub for transparency
